content:
Dear colleagues
you will find here the update on the activities of the CLAIRE covid19 task force

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xGOqvLYRsJdI6eYO9M2WMtZUcXVBLXgJpUQG-RP-Dmc/edit?usp=sharing
Please check the OPEN TASKS for all volunteers who registered!
For comments please react on this thread
Gianluca Bontempi on behalf of the task force coordinators

Daily CLAIRE covid19 task force update
Daily update of the CLAIRE covid19 task force Date: March the 24th 2020 Mission statement: Leveraging artificial intelligence to help manage the Covid-19 crisis Task force coordinators TFC (alphabetical order): Tonio Ball, Gianluca Bontempi, Ricardo Chavarriaga, Emanuela Girardi, Holger Hoos, Ia...

Here you will find today update
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xGOqvLYRsJdI6eYO9M2WMtZUcXVBLXgJpUQG-RP-Dmc/edit#

We need to proceed to the appointment of leaders of single subtasks. If interested in leading one of the subtasks, please contact the task force members at covid19@claire-ai.org

Daily CLAIRE covid19 task force update
Daily update of the CLAIRE covid19 task force Date: March 26th 2020 Mission statement: Leveraging artificial intelligence to help manage the Covid-19 crisis News update Now 79 research groups have volunteered to contribute to this initiative and 25 parallel initiatives have been identified. To i...

Here you will find the update

https://www.dropbox.com/s/znf9k08ps9dqsmx/Daily%20CLAIRE%20covid19%20task%20force%20update%20%28March%20the%2031st%29.pdf.pdf?dl=0

For any comments/questions react on this thread or contact the Task force coordinators at covid19@claire-ai.org

Daily CLAIRE covid19 task force update (March the 31st).pdf.pdf

Some tasks of topic coordinator are still vacant. Please look at the attached doc and contact us at covid19@claire-ai.org if interested .
All comments/remarks welcome. Daily-CLAIRE-covid19-task-force-update.pdf

Here you will find the update

Daily-CLAIRE-covid19-task-force-update.pdf

Some positions of "topic coordinator" are still vacant. Please look at the attached doc and contact us at covid19@claire-ai.org if interested.
Feel free to contact topic coordinators if you want to contribute.
All comments/remarks welcome.

Have a nice we. Gianluca on behalf of the CLAIRE COVID19 task force
